loan.name: Gs Guano Group
loan.use: to buy molasses, grass, vitamins and fertilizers for his business.
loan.description:
Fredy, 48, lives in the village of El Guano, Trojes in the east of Honduras. He has made a living selling dairy products and livestock for ten years. Fredy is applying for a loan to buy molasses, grass, vitamins and fertilizers for his business. He hopes that with the help of this loan, he will have a better product because his cows will be strong and healthy, providing more milk of a better quality.

Juana, 42, has been growing coffee for 15 years. She will use this loan to buy fertilizers for her farm.

Concepci√≥n, 48, lives with her husband and her main source of income is growing coffee. She will use this loan to buy fertilizers.

The younger Fredy, 19, lives in the community of El Guano. He is single and makes a living raising and fattening pigs. Just like his father, he works in agriculture. They are very hardworking people who are sure that their only way to get ahead is to work hard.
